io.elegie.luchess.core.api.explore

Interface Query<T extends QueryResult>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The Result return by the Query.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    GameFindQuery, GameListQuery
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameFindQueryImpl, GameListQueryImpl, TimedGameListQuery

    public interface Query<T extends QueryResult>
    Specifies a domain query to be performed against the index. The Query model has been inspired by the Command Pattern.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T execute()
      Execute the query.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        T execute()
                              throws QueryException
        Execute the query. We do not make any assumption on the result returned by the query, and let implementations decide whether they want a fully-loaded or lazily-loaded result set.
        Returns:
        The result of the query, containing all relevant data.
        Throws:
        QueryException - When the Query could not be executed, because of technical (non-domain) problems, such as a non-existing or unreachable index.
